title: [Tricks and Quarrels]
description: Along the walls here are heavy iron sconces that comprise the entirety of the decor, and atop them sit brightly burning candles.  Moonlight tumbles in from a window high above, silvering the surface of the glass-walled case that sits against one wall.  On the opposing wall is a small table, a woven rowan basket set upon it, with a short stocky barrel placed alongside.

Along the walls here are heavy iron sconces that comprise the entirety of the decor, and atop them sit unlit candles.  Sunlight illuminates the space from a window high above, glaring harshly off the surface of the glass-walled case that sits against one wall.  On the opposing wall is a small table, a woven rowan basket set upon it, with a short stocky barrel placed alongside.
